name: Colourizz: Drift Arena
description:
Welcome to GridEyePIX's page!

Super easy to control and fun to play this little minimalist drift car game! You need to pick up the yellow dots without touching white areas!

In options, you can select the car and change the control buttons.

Control this game using mouse clicks, touches or keyboard LEFT and RIGHT to steer and SPACE BAR to brake.

If you want to know more visit grideyepix.com website !

Make sure you comment your(real) best score ;) !

Enjoy and Have fun! :)
